item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 巧克力的主要原料可可继续上涨，在复活节前创下新纪录。由于需求超出预期，石油有望延续月度连涨势头。而铜投资者正在加大对这种工业金属的看涨押注。【原文：Cocoa, the key chocolate-making ingredient, continues to rally, setting fresh records ahead of Easter. item.title: 屡遭挫折，全球债券市场重启降息交易
item.description: 由于美联储和全球主要同业似乎最终将在 6 月份开始降息，债券交易员们正在谨慎地重新下注，而几周前他们的赌注才刚刚烧完。【原文：Bond traders are cautiously reloading wagers that burned them just weeks ago as the Federal Reserve and key global peers finally appear set to begin reducing interest rates as soon as June.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔准备支持就业市场，即使这意味着通胀持续存在
item.description: 随着 2022 年通胀飙升，美联储通过提高利率来防止工资螺旋式上涨。现在，随着失业率的攀升，央行发出了降息的信号，以防止裁员螺旋式上升--即使这意味着通胀率会暂时有所上升。【原文：As inflation surged in 2022, the Federal Reserve moved to prevent a wage-hike spiral by jacking up interest rates. Now, with unemployment edging up, the central bank is signaling a willingness to cut rates to head off a job-cutting spiral – even if that means somewhat higher inflation for a while.】

item.title: Advent和CVC联合竞购宠物食品合作伙伴：金融时报
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，Advent International 和 CVC Capital 已提交联合竞标书，收购总部位于匈牙利的 Partner in Pet Food，该公司目前由英国收购集团 Cinven 拥有。【原文：Advent International and CVC Capital have submitted a joint bid to buy Hungary-based Partner in Pet Food, which is currently owned by UK buyout group Cinven, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国石化 2023 年利润因油价下跌而下降 13%，炼油量创历史新高
item.description: 中石化的年度利润下降了 13%，此前油价下跌，而中国炼油企业的加工量和进口量创下了历史新高。【原文：Sinopec’s annual profits declined 13%, after oil prices fell and Chinese refiners posted a record year for processing and imports.】

item.description: 房地产投资者已经受到高利率的打击，现在又面临着欧洲新法规引发的大幅减值前景。【原文：Real estate investors already battered by high interest rates now face the prospect of significant writedowns triggered by new European regulations.】

item.title: 塞内加尔总统选举投票结果悬而未决
item.description: 塞内加尔选民开始在总统选举中投票，主要候选人将为非洲增长最快的经济体之一提供政策连续性或激进新路线的选择。【原文：Senegal’s voters began casting their ballots in a presidential election in which the leading candidates offer a choice between policy continuity or a radical new course for one of Africa’s fastest-growing economies.】

item.title: 会德丰出售四季名园新盘获利 24 亿港元
item.description: 会德丰地产有限公司（Wheelock Properties Ltd.）在周六晚些时候的一条短信中称，该公司在香港出售了其Seasons Place项目中的368套公寓，获得了近24亿港元（3.07亿美元）的收入。【原文：Wheelock Properties Ltd. fetched nearly HK$2.4 billion ($307 million) selling 368 apartments in its Seasons Place project in Hong Kong, the developer said in a text message late Saturday.】

item.title: KKR 委任 Richdale 发掘亚洲机构和家族资本
item.description: KKR & Co.任命凯特-里奇代尔（Kate Richdale）领导其机构资本工作，并负责一项新举措，旨在开发亚太地区日益增长的企业和家族财富，使其成为日益重要的资本和交易来源。【原文：KKR & Co. appointed Kate Richdale to lead its institutional capital efforts and take charge of a new initiative that aims to tap growing corporate and family wealth in Asia Pacific as an increasingly vital source of capital and dealmaking.】

item.title: Gucci 在中国的震撼在奢侈品界引起反响
item.description: 一年来，中国消费者对奢侈品消费放缓的担忧一直困扰着奢侈品行业。上周，时尚界最大、但最容易受到影响的品牌之一--古驰（Gucci）--终于意识到了问题的严重性。【原文：Fears of a slowdown among Chinese shoppers have dogged the luxury industry for the better part of a year. Last week the scale of the problem hit home for one of fashion’s biggest but most exposed brands, Gucci.】

item.title: 中国总理淡化经济风险，强调政策空间
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强淡化了投资者对经济面临挑战的担忧，称中国政府正在加大政策支持力度以刺激经济增长，并正在应对系统性风险。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang downplayed investor concerns of challenges facing the economy, saying Beijing is stepping up policy support to spur growth and systemic risks are being addressed.】

item.title: 美国通胀指标有望增强美联储对利率的耐心
item.description: 2 月份，美联储首选的衡量美国潜在通胀的指标可能仍然高得令人不安，这表明央行行长对过早降息持谨慎态度的原因。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred measure of underlying US inflation probably remained uncomfortably high in February, showing why central bankers are wary about cutting interest rate too soon.】

item.title: 恩库贝说：尽管亏损，津巴布韦仍将保留本币
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，即使财政和货币当局正在制定新的货币改革计划，津巴布韦仍计划保留本币，因为本币在今年的每个交易日都在贬值。【原文：Zimbabwe plans to keep its local dollar, a currency that has lost value every single trading day of the year, even as fiscal and monetary authorities work on new plans to revamp the currency, according to Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube.】

item.title: 拜登签署1.2万亿美元拨款法案结束停摆威胁
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登签署了一项1.2万亿美元的一揽子拨款计划，该计划将使美国政府的运作持续到9月30日，从而避免了政府部分停摆。【原文：President Joe Biden signed a $1.2 trillion funding package that keeps the US government running through Sept. 30, averting a partial government shutdown.】
